term.longtitle: IUPAC Gold Book - passive state in electrochemical corrosion
term.title: passive state

item.text: The passive state is characterized by a contiguous 'passivating film' of solid corrosion products separating the metallic phase from the adjacent electrolyte. Corrosion in the passive state involves growth of the passivating film and/or transfer of metal ions through the film into the electrolyte.
